full_sentence: Has this happened to anyone? I just can't put aside racial evolution, it just doesn't make sense to. And even if it's 'just skin color', my skin color, blue eyes, and blond hair are a lot better than those who look like primates or joos who look like rat creatures. Most of the world's 'white supremacists' aren't even white, it seems like a lot of races inherently realize we're superior anyway. Like a filipino girl asked me once 'how does it feel to be god's favorite'. Is there any way to hypothetically untake the redpill? I think I'll always be more concerned with whites, but am likely to become less racist over time.
ALL NIGGERS HOULD DIE - this was the message my daughter got today at school
hey i am serious I don't trust Asians who speak English that well, I fear they are spies !
